name: onyx mitts
notes:
nothing says luxury like a pair of cashmere gloves and the onyx mitts are just that. these minimalist mitts are perfect for everyone and every occasion. we’re certain this will the pair you grab again and again when the air is cool and crisp.

**size**
adult small (medium, large)

**finished measurements**
hand circumference: 7 (7¾, 8½)”
length: 8 (8½, 9)”

**materials**
[**fibra natura** *cashmere lusso*][1] (50% virgin cashmere wool, 50% recycled cashmere wool; 50g/246 yds)
•	any color – 1 ball (all sizes)
*sample shown in 10005 lavagna* 
needles: us size 3 (3.25 mm) set of dpns (or your preferred needles for small circumference knitting) or size needed to obtain gauge
us size 2 (2.75 mm) set of dpns (or your preferred needles for small circumference knitting)
notions: stitch markers, tapestry needle, stitch holder or waste yarn

**gauge**
26 sts x 34 rnds = 4” in st st with larger ndl 

**pattern notes**
these mitts are knit in the round from the bottom up. stitches are increased for the thumb, then divided to work the hand and thumb separately. 
 


  [1]: https://universalyarn.com/products/cashmere
